Blog.post: had nball damn earlie todae..ard 8..hahaxx..damn tirin sia..afta tt.. plaed water fight!!!coolin..hahaz..bridget poured me water first!!dint hav a chance to get bck at her:(...im yett to get my revenge--ahahahazz*evil grin* sak todae duno y weird abit..hahahaz!! erm..ju oso got wet..hahaz...farnie sia..lolx..i managed to get bck at nabiha..hahaxx!!yay..so happie..wahahhazz!!den afta tt...went to QSC to eat...decided nt to eat chicken rice 4 sak's sake..ahahaz..nvm la...for my fwen..alwaes giv in eh??hahaxx.. but my lunch was still gd:)..ate nasi lemak..ahaz..duno y ttt sak dint eat..i bet shes lyk relli damn hungry now..hahaxx!!haix..i tink bcz mayb shes shy in front of gerald or sumthin--anw..afta tt we went look ard 4 socca boots..met aaron too..i relli luv his shoes manz..super COOL!!but its kinda irritatin tho..ahahazz.. latr went to my place plae pool..dint plae bowlin..dint manage to win any games..sadz..hahaxx..gerald dint plae well todae..aaron did...[by luck]ahahahazz!! hmmz...damn tt gerald manz..de lady came to me who broke da thingy bt i told her it was alrd lyk tt...gerald said it too..den de lady left he said "wads wrong wif her?"so loud sia..i bet she heard..wad da hell??ahahax..dey ate ice creemz..i dint..nno junk food 4 me..wahahaz..anwz..aaron n gerald went bck..aaron's fader pickd dem up..so tts abt it..nw im in my rm wit sak n bridget...n sis..heeehxx...chaoz...++jelly++rustie.

..had netball yesterdae at 8 in da mornin..wif sum of da ko0ko0 sistaz..(..nabila..bridget..sakinah..juriani..)..surprised 2 see bridget n sakinah alrd dere..tot dey wud come late!!..hahahx..bt mel dint come tho..cuz she said she was tired..or juz lazy??..haix..anwz bridget juz join netball yesterdae!!...so happie!!..hahahax..cuz she juz gt sacked frm band!!..hw sad..bt who cares..band is nt dat great anwz rite??..heehx..hmmx..netball was TIRIN manz..ran 3 rounds..did lots of ballwork..n we dint play any game!!..*sobz*..ohyah..ju broke her specs...hw unlucky..n nabila too..nt realli broke..bt gt hit by da ball..and it was bent..so..ya la..ju n nabila was SPECLESS yesterdae..lolx..hmmx..after netball..we went 2 eat at KFC..bt before dat..we met aaron at gosports..wanted 2 wait fer gerald 2 come..bt dat sakinah dint wan..cuz she was damn hungry..haix..so impatient!!..hahahx..hmmx..bt we had a GOOD meal at KFC yeah??..heehx..we talked at B.K afta dat..went round at da shoppin centres..n went 2 COLD STORAGE!!..bought fruit juice..hahahx...cuz we're nt gonna drink any soft drinks frm nw on!!..we're goin on a healthy urlLink diet ..muahaha..we went 2 chill at da so called 'park'..went 2 sit..n called mel..hahahx..n went CRAZIEE!!..me n bridget was SHOELESS..hahahx..went 2 walk at dose stone thingy..lolx..it was PAINFUL!!..ohya..we called mel 2 see weda we can go 2 her hse 2 play urlLink tennis ..we CUD!!..hahahx..so..afta a few mins of chillin..we took a taxi dere..met mel...n booked da urlLink tennis court..hahhax..played wif bomb urlLink bags too..n we gt scolded by da urlLink security guard cuz mel threw a bomb bag at da cat..!!..lolx...it was farnie..'..da cat's hearin is 10 times more sensitive den humans u noe!!..'..hahahahax..hmmx..played urlLink tennis n met wif dose 2 irritatin boys!!..one was gerald..n da oder one was gordan??..hahha..weird..dey were lyk so rude okz..scold me..bt luckily..i cud fight bak!!..hahahx..dickheads!!..

..HYEROLLAZ..a.k.a ko0ko0 sistaZ totally rock!!..n i lurve each n evry one of dem 2 pieces!!..heehx..[1]-melissa- [2]-steffi- [3]-juriani- [4]-nabiha- > [5]-sakinah- [6]-nabila- [7]-bridget- [8]-lynette- ...peaceout;)... *muackz*

..went to sEnt0sA yesterdae..wif sum of da hyer0llaz*sistaz*(bidget..sakinah..nabila..lynn..)..n wif lyn's guy [lester]n his frens too..abt 2 of dem..it was hell lot of fun ae!!.. >..*..it was pretty cool!!..gotta catch some action on da beach..BAYWATCH!!..saw 2 ppl runnin like in baywatch..me n sakinah even try 2 act it out..!!..hahax..*..++went kayakin fer da 1st everr..n it wasn't easy as i xpected tho..lyk..u noe..in da arcade..dey hv dose kayakin machines..dat was pretty easy ae??!!..++..hahax..-=..we gotta xchnge partners..cuz me n lyn was lyk dead tired n we dint realli noe hw 2 kayak!!..lolx..n we xchnge in da middle of da sea..da kayaks nearly turned overr!!..try 2 tink of it..it was scariee..~n it was so farnie to0~..lolx..i was wif dat 'bobby' guy..i 4gt his real name..*damn!*..hahax..n lyn was wif lester..*at least he knew hw 2 turn properly..hahahax..unlike me n lynn..[so unxperienced]..instead of goin right or left..we went in circles n circles..n kept bangin at dose darn ROCKS!!..*..hahahax...[[sakinah..nabila..n bridget..went fer a swim..!!]]..played arnd..while me n lyn was busy wif da sand drawings..n we initially gt pretty wet..cuz of DEM!!..hw evil can dey get??..muahahaha...

..tuesday was fun ae??..hahahahx..eventho lessons started already..bt at least nt so bad rite..~we all had recess together 4 2 days alreadi..hahahax..so happiE!!~..hmmx..nuthin much on diz dae xcept we gt assembly..and..erm..dats it i guess..hahahax..hmmx..*tryin 2 rmb*..afta skool we went to eat at g0 sports..eat cuppi noodles..hahahx..it was gooooooooo0d..cuz mayb we were hungry arh?..lolx..den afta dat..went 2 sko0l 2 chnge cuz gt socca..den waited lyk fer 1 hr fer da liverpo0l team 2 arrive..hahahax..bt nvm la..at least dey come..den played until lyk 6..afta dat went 2 B.K 2 eat..n talk a lt of crap wif..dez..hazirah..sakinah..bridget..me..n nabila..it was fun..hahahx..LESBOS!!..heehx.. :P >

..heyax sistaz!!..hahahahx..monday was sorta a NOT-SO-GOOD-DAY ritez?..we kinda gt into a small prob..hahahax..so LAME!!..hmmx..anwz..wad can i sae bout da 1st day of skool huh?..it was damn FUN ae!!..no lessons..so can SLACK!!..hahahx..we supposed-ly 2 go fer netball..bt skipped cuz we went 2 watch socca match instead..hahahx..liverpo0l womens team and tampines r0vers..it was co0l ae?..hahahx..4-1!!..hahah..hmmx..dat day was also a LOT-OF-CRAP-DAY-DAT-WE-SHUDEN-DO-IT-AGAIN!!...hahahax..no more quarrels ova small petty stuff kae?.. :)

...hahahahax..thursday was a pretty fun day i suppose...today we gt da urlLink news dat on friday we can wear h0me cl0thes!!!...co0l ae??..hahahax..n we kinda gt a small c0mm0ti0n abt wh0s gonna wear wad?..haix..sum ppl gt s0 w0rked up cuz 0f dat..i dun understnd!!..bt anyways..afta sko0l..lyn n bridget went 2 my hse 2 pick 0ut wad dey wanna wear..hahahx..co0l.. :)

...!!socca match!!...hahahx..i kinda forgot wad we did xcept fer da socca part...hmmx..lets c..on wednesdae..we had recess together agen..hahahx..co0l..den afta dat we had socca match wif da sec 1 b0ys!!..we l0st 10-1?!!..how sad is dat??..hahahax..and all guys were so damn irritatin..hahahx..run s0 damn fast!!...~bleahx~..hmmx..ohyah..sakinah gt a yell0w card!!..hahahax...so farnieee...den..we went 2 chill at da hawker centre..hahahax..ate ice kacang n popiah!!...go0d fo0d!!... :)..dtas all i can write ...heehx...
